review: I waz secaptal at first but after a few days I got use to the menus and other features and now I love it who needs cable when u got fire stick
author: matthew ray

review: Excellent product.  Easy to set up and navigate.  Very user friendly.  I highly recommend it!
author: Daniel Beismer

review: Its awesome easy setup and i love u can personalized your screensaver :D
author: zoie

review: Overall great device, extended use creates lagging and has to be power cycled.
author: Funkypunk

review: can't cast from PC or desktop? forget it!Cancelled my pre-order.Chromecast supports casting from cloud, windows pc, android phone.  Amazon once again has tried to build a wall around their product, but have strangled themselves instead.
author: Barry Holsinger

review: I can't get the screen mirroring to work with my Galaxy s5, I have used a chromecast that works perfectly for mirroring and I figured this would do the same.  Every time I try it just pops up an error message stating that it couldn't connect.  Everything else seems to work okay, but that was the main reason I wanted it.  So not really very useful for me.  If they fix the screen mirroring, then I would give it a 5 star rating.
author: Lindsay Sheffield

review: Awesome! The value of the Fire TV Stick is awesome....Bye! Chromecast <-- dead man walking!
author: Victor
